templates.subject: Upcoming Mortgage Payment Due {{PaymentDueDate}}
templates.body_md:
This is a courtesy reminder that your mortgage payment for loan {{LoanNumber}} will be due on {{PaymentDueDate}} for the property at {{PropertyAddress}}. The amount due is {{AmountDue}}.

**What to do now**
- Schedule payment in the portal: {{PortalURL}}
- Enable automatic payments
- Call {{ServicerPhone}} for assistance

If you anticipate difficulty paying by {{PaymentDueDate}}, contact us immediately.

templates.subject: Action Requested before {{PaymentDueDate}} for Loan {{LoanNumber}}
Your Payment Is Due Today for Loan {{LoanNumber}}
Last Day to Pay without a Late Charge
templates.body_md:
As of today your payment due {{PaymentDueDate}} has not posted. The grace period ends on {{GraceEndDate}}. To avoid a late charge of {{LateFeeAmount}}, pay today at {{PortalURL}} or send certified funds by wire.

If you have already paid, thank you. If you are unable to pay by today, contact us now so we can discuss assistance.

templates.subject: Account Past Due and Help Available
30-Day Delinquency Notice and Next Steps
We Need to Speak with You about Assistance
templates.body_md: We are attempting to reach you to discuss your delinquency and available assistance. Please call {{ServicerPhone}} or begin your application at {{PortalURL}}.

templates.subject: Important Written Notice about Your Delinquent Mortgage
templates.body_md:
Your mortgage is {{DaysDelinquent}} days delinquent. Past-due amount is {{PastDueAmount}}.

**What you must do**
- Submit a complete assistance application by {{LossMitigationDeadline}} at {{PortalURL}}, **or**
- Pay {{CureAmount}} by {{CureByDate}} to bring the loan current.

If you need help, call {{ServicerPhone}}.

templates.subject: 60-Day Delinquency and Required Documents
templates.body_md:
Your account is 60 days delinquent. Past-due amount is {{PastDueAmount}}.

If you started an assistance application, we still require the following to complete your file: income verification, bank statements, hardship explanation, and any requested authorizations. Upload at {{PortalURL}} by {{LossMitigationDeadline}}. Paying {{CureAmount}} by {{CureByDate}} will also restore the account to current.

templates.subject: Escalation Review Scheduled for Your Delinquent Loan
templates.body_md:
Your loan remains delinquent and is scheduled for internal escalation on {{ReviewDate}}.

**To avoid additional collection activity**
- Pay {{CureAmount}} by {{CureByDate}}, or
- Contact us by {{CallBackDate}} to complete your assistance application.

If we do not hear from you, we will proceed with the escalation review.

templates.subject: 90-Day Delinquency and Warning of Further Action
templates.body_md:
At 90 days past due, your account is at risk of acceleration and referral to foreclosure processes if not cured.

**Total due to cure today**: {{CureAmount}}
To avoid referral, pay {{CureAmount}} by {{CureByDate}} or submit a complete application by {{LossMitigationDeadline}}.
If you already submitted an application, we will advise you of any missing items.

templates.subject: Final Warning before Intent to Accelerate
templates.body_md:
Unless we receive {{CureAmount}} by {{CureByDate}} or a complete application by {{LossMitigationDeadline}}, we intend to issue a formal Notice of Intent to Accelerate. This may lead to foreclosure if the default is not cured.

Call {{ServicerPhone}} immediately if you wish to discuss options.

templates.subject: Notice of Intent to Accelerate and Foreclose
Notice of Referral to Foreclosure Counsel
templates.body_md: Because we did not receive the cure amount or a complete application by the stated deadlines, your account has been referred to foreclosure counsel for your county of record. You may still contact us to discuss options that could stop further action if you qualify. This notice does not waive any rights.

templates.subject: Payoff Demand Through {{GoodThroughDate}}
Your Payoff Quote Expires on {{GoodThroughDate}}
templates.body_md: Your payoff demand expires on **{{GoodThroughDate}}**. If funds will arrive after that date, request an updated payoff so per-diem and any fee changes are captured. For closings, settlement agents should obtain a day-of-funding demand.

templates.subject: Payoff Funds Received and Pending Finalization
templates.body_md: We received funds toward your payoff for loan {{LoanNumber}}. Once funds clear, we will finalize the payoff and begin lien release. Returned items will reverse the payoff and additional interest will accrue until cleared.

templates.subject: Paid in Full and Lien Release Scheduled
templates.body_md: Your loan has been **paid in full**. We have initiated lien release with the recording jurisdiction. You will receive confirmation when recorded. Save this letter with your records.

templates.subject: Additional Funds Required to Complete Payoff
templates.body_md: The funds received are insufficient to satisfy the payoff by {{GoodThroughDate}}. **Shortfall**: {{PastDueAmount}}. Please remit the difference immediately or request an updated payoff.

templates.subject: Overpayment Refund After Payoff
templates.body_md: An overpayment of {{AmountDue}} remains after payoff. We will mail a refund to {{MailingAddress}} unless you select an electronic refund in the portal.

templates.subject: Returned Payment and Account Update
templates.body_md: Your {{PaymentMethod}} payment dated {{PaymentDueDate}} for {{AmountDue}} was returned for reason: {{ReturnCode}}. The payment has been reversed. Your new past-due amount is {{PastDueAmount}}. Make a replacement payment by certified funds or wire. Multiple returns may disable this method.

templates.subject: Scheduled Retry of Your Returned Payment
templates.body_md: We plan to retry the payment on the next business day permitted by your bank. Ensure sufficient funds are available. To cancel the retry or use a different method, call {{ServicerPhone}}.

templates.subject: Payment Method Disabled After Returned Items
templates.body_md: Due to multiple returned items within our policy window, we have disabled this payment method. Certified funds or wire are required for future payments. Contact us to review reinstatement conditions.

templates.subject: Reversal Complete and Updated Account Balance
templates.body_md: We completed the reversal of the returned payment and adjusted your ledger. Your current past-due amount is {{PastDueAmount}} as of {{TodayFull}}. If you believe the return was in error, contact your bank and call us.

templates.subject: Action Required – Proof of Hazard Insurance for {{PropertyAddress}}
templates.body_md: Our records do not show acceptable evidence of hazard insurance. Provide a declarations page including named insured, property address, policy number, effective dates, carrier, and the mortgagee clause listing {{ServicerName}}. Upload at {{PortalURL}} by {{CureByDate}} to avoid lender-placed insurance which can be more costly and provide less coverage.

templates.subject: Final Notice – Insurance Will Be Purchased if Proof Is Not Received
templates.body_md: If we do not receive acceptable proof by {{CureByDate}}, we will obtain lender-placed insurance and charge the cost to your escrow or account. If you later provide proof of overlapping coverage, we will cancel and refund overlapping premiums as required.

templates.subject: Lender-Placed Insurance Put in Force
templates.body_md: We purchased insurance because acceptable proof was not received. The premium will be charged to your account. This coverage may offer limited protection. Provide proof of your own coverage to cancel and obtain any eligible refund.

templates.subject: Insurance Premium Paid From Escrow
templates.body_md: We paid your {{InsuranceType}} premium from escrow on {{PaymentDueDate}} in the amount of {{AmountDue}}. Keep your insurance records updated in the portal.

templates.subject: Your Interest Rate Will Adjust on {{ARMEffective}}
templates.body_md: Your rate will adjust based on index {{ARMIndex}} plus margin {{ARMMargin}}, subject to caps. New annual rate: {{ARMNewRate}}. New payment: {{ARMNewPmt}} effective with the payment due {{ARMEffective}}. Prior payment: {{ARMPrevPmt}}. If escrow changes apply, you will receive a separate escrow letter. If this creates hardship, call {{ServicerPhone}}.

templates.subject: Upcoming Payment Change Effective {{ARMEffective}}
templates.body_md: Your adjustable payment will change to {{ARMNewPmt}} based on a new rate of {{ARMNewRate}}. Details are available in the portal.

templates.subject: New Rate and Payment Now in Effect
templates.body_md: Your new rate and payment are now effective. Autopay can help prevent missed payments. Activate in the portal.

templates.subject: Free HUD-Approved Housing Counseling Resources
templates.body_md: You can contact a HUD-approved housing counselor for free assistance. A directory is available at {{HUDCounselorURL}}. We are available at {{ServicerPhone}} to discuss options that may help you keep your home.

templates.subject: FHA Loss Mitigation Options and Application Requirements
templates.body_md: Because your FHA-insured loan is past due, you may be eligible for programs such as special forbearance, partial claim, or modification. Submit a complete application by {{LossMitigationDeadline}} with income proof, bank statements, hardship explanation, and third-party authorizations. Apply at {{PortalURL}}.

templates.subject: FHA Partial Claim Approval and Next Steps
templates.body_md: Your FHA partial claim is approved. This places past-due amounts into a subordinate, non-interest-bearing lien payable at payoff or maturity. Review and sign the enclosed documents by {{CureByDate}}.

templates.subject: Assistance Application Decision and Appeal Rights
templates.body_md: After reviewing your application, you are not eligible for the requested option for the reasons listed in the enclosed decision. If you wish to appeal, submit additional information by {{LossMitigationDeadline}}.

templates.subject: Your Monthly Mortgage Statement Is Ready
templates.body_md: Your statement for the period including {{PaymentDueDate}} is available in the portal. Review your payment amount, escrow details, and recent transactions.

templates.subject: Partial Payment Held in Unapplied Funds
templates.body_md: We received a partial payment that is less than a full periodic payment under your note. Funds are held unapplied. You may send the remaining amount, instruct us to apply to principal if permitted, or request a return. Contact {{ServicerPhone}}.

templates.subject: Contact Information Updated
templates.body_md: We updated your contact information as requested. If you did not authorize this change, call {{ServicerPhone}} immediately.
